name: Battery Life Live Tile
short_description:
The project requires two to work correctly. Windows 8 apps cannot acces system information including the device battery life. However if the device is running on an intel based system then a windows forms application can be set to run in the system tray that will read the device power settings and battery percentage and write the information to a file.

Next a windows 8 app can be set up to read the file on a timer and update the live tile with the new battery information.

Problems: as of now i can't set up a backround task in the windows 8 app that will read a local file. So as of yet the app just has a button that will update the live tile with the new information
summary: Displays the device battery percentage in a live tile on win 8
